original_title: Popular Mechanics For Kids - Slither & Slime And Other Yucky Things
overview: Gross out!  Join Jay, Elisha, Tyler and Vanessa as they skulk down stinky sewers and dig through piles of garbage and bug out with leeches and roaches and worms in 4 episodes of exploring slimy and yucky things!  UNDERGROUND GARBAGE CREEPY CRAWLERS SLIMY AND SLITHERY
title: Popular Mechanics For Kids - Slither & Slime And Other Yucky Things
